name: Reach It! (Abstract Kessoe)
description:
You have to help your AI buddy to survive. The AI isn't smart enough to stop for danger, so it's up to you to save the bot! Run through the track as fast as you can and pull the levers to remove the danger! Your goal is to get the bot across the finish line.

Controls:

Use 'WASD' to move.

Use 'Mouse' to look around.

Use 'Left mouse click' to interact.

Use 'Escape' to go to the main menu.

Play the 'download version' for the best experience!

This game is made by Abstract Kessoe for the 'Wowie Jam 4.0'

The game is made in 3,5 days.

All models and mechanics are made by Abstract Kessoe.

The music is made with software that develops music using artificial intelligence.
